content.question: A group of researchers conduct a study where they tell the participants that they will be doing a memory study, but the researchers were actually measuring levels of anxiety about doing well on a task. The group of researchers should be sure to do which of the following at the conclusion of this study?

choices.label: Use deception so the participants won't know the true nature of the study.
Identify the confounding variables to improve the statistical accuracy of the study.
Explain the purpose of a study before the study begins.
Explain the true purpose of a study immediately after the study is complete.

content.answer: Explain the true purpose of a study immediately after the study is complete.

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
